content:
I'm glad to hear that! Finishing a series can be a great feeling, especially when it's a long-running one. It's like closing a chapter and moving on to a new adventure. And with so many great shows out there, it's exciting to explore new stories and characters.

If you're looking for recommendations or need help finding your next binge-worthy series, feel free to ask! I'd be happy to help you discover something new.

Now, go enjoy "The Dawn Wall" and get ready to be inspired by Tommy and Kevin's incredible journey!
